content: Set lifetime of <1>{{data}}</1> for all files in room

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message about setting the lifetime of files in a room. It appears on a settings panel or configuration screen, likely as part of options for room-related functionality. Translators should focus on conveying a sense of duration and file management.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation 'تعيين مدة حياة <1>{{data}}</1> الجميع الملفات في الغرفة' is not an accurate translation of 'Set lifetime of <1>{{data}}</1> for all files in room'. The phrase 'الجميع الملفات' is grammatically incorrect and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'all files'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تعيين مدة حياة <1>{{data}}</1> لجميع الملفات في الغرفة

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'الجميع الملفات' is grammatically incorrect. It should be 'جميع الملفات'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: جميع الملفات

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'istifadə müddətini' (usage period) is a slightly awkward translation of 'lifetime'. A more natural phrasing would be 'ömrünü' or 'davamet etme muddetini'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otaqdakı bütün faylların ömrünü <1>{{data}}</1> olaraq təyin edin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The formatting tag '<1>{{data}}</1>' appears correctly in both the English and Azerbaijani versions, which is good.

The term 'lifetime' is better translated as 'срок на валидност' or 'срок на съществуване' rather than 'продължителност на живот' in this technical context. While 'продължителност на живот' isn't strictly incorrect, it's less precise for file lifetimes.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Задайте срок на валидност на <1>{{data}}</1> за всички файлове в стаята

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ορισμός διάρκειας ζωής" is a bit literal and could be more natural. A better phrasing would capture the sense of 'setting' or 'assigning' a lifetime.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ανάθεση διάρκειας ζωής

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "για όλα τα αρχεία στο δωμάτιο" can be slightly more concise. It's a bit wordy for a UI element.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: σε όλα τα αρχεία του δωματίου

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation 'Aseta <1>{{data}}</1> ikä kaikille huoneen tiedostoille' uses 'ikä' which translates to 'age'. The intended meaning is 'lifetime'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aseta <1>{{data}}</1> elinikä kaikille huoneen tiedostoille

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'lifetime' as 'durée de vie' is technically correct, but in the context of file management, 'durée de conservation' would be a more natural and common phrasing. 'Durée de vie' implies a living lifespan, which doesn't apply to files.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Définir la durée de conservation de <1>{{data}}</1> pour tous les fichiers de la salle

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term "lifetime" is best translated as "մատվյան շրջանակ" (matvyan shrjanak) or "աշխատանքային ժամանակահատված" (ashxatakanak zhamanakahatvad) rather than "ծառայության ժամկետը" (tsaruyutyun zhamkerti). While "ծառայության ժամկետը" can be used in some contexts, it implies a service duration, which isn't the primary meaning of "lifetime" in this case.  'ծառայության ժամկետը' suggests something providing a service.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'lifetime' as 'մատվյան շրջանակ' or 'աշխատանքային ժամանակահատված'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Set lifetime" is better translated as "期限を設定する (Kigen o setto suru)" rather than just "設定する (setto suru)".  While 'setto suru' isn't *wrong*, it's less precise in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルーム内のすべてのファイルの有効期限を <1>{{data}}</1> に期限を設定

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Set lifetime' is not accurately conveyed. '설정' (seong) implies a setting or configuration, but doesn't directly translate to 'setting the lifetime'. A more accurate translation would incorporate the action of setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 룸에 있는 모든 파일에 대해 <1>{{data}}</1>의 유효 기간을 설정합니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The angle brackets `<1>{{data}}</1>` seem inconsistent in Korean. Korean typically uses more natural phrasing rather than mimicking the English tag structure. While maintaining the tag is possible, it might sound unnatural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 룸에 있는 모든 파일에 대해 <1>{{data}}</1>의 유효 기간을 설정합니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation includes angle brackets <1>{{data}}</1> which mirrors the English. These brackets are likely unnecessary in the Lao translation and should be removed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ກຳນົດໄລຍະເວລາຂອງ {{data}} ສຳລັບເອກະສານທັງໝົດໃນຫ້ອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "kalpošanas laiks" (service life) isn't the most natural translation for "lifetime" in this context. "Dzīves laiks" is a more direct and commonly used equivalent when referring to the duration a file exists or is accessible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iestatiet <1>{{data}}</1> dzīves laiku visiem telpā esošajiem failiem

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'lifetime' is best translated as 'duração' or 'prazo de validade' rather than 'tempo de vida' in this context. 'Tempo de vida' is too literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning of file retention.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Defina a duração de <1>{{data}}</1> para todos os arquivos na sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'lifetime' is better translated as 'tempo de vida útil' in Portuguese to accurately convey the intended meaning. Simply translating it as 'vida útil' feels incomplete and may not be understood in context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Definir o tempo de vida útil de <1>{{data}}</1> para todos os arquivos na sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Durata de viață de <1>{{data}}</1> pentru toate fișiere din sala" is not ideal. "Durata de viață" translates to "lifetime", but the phrasing sounds awkward in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would be "Stabilește durata de viață" or "Setează durata de viață".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Stabilește durata de viață de <1>{{data}}</1> pentru toate fișierele din sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sala' should be 'sala' with an 'e' at the end. 'Sala' means room, but 'sale' is incorrect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Stabilește durata de viață de <1>{{data}}</1> pentru toate fișierele din sala

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Установлен срок действия' (Established term of validity) implies that the action has already been completed. The English phrase 'Set lifetime' indicates an action being performed. A more accurate translation would be 'Установите срок действия' (Set term of validity).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Установите срок действия <1>{{data}}</1> для всех файлов в комнате

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "සියලු ගොනු සඳහා <1>{{data}}</1> හි කාලායතනය සකසන්න" is not the most natural way to express 'Set lifetime of <1>{{data}}</1> for all files in room'. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'සියලුම ගොනු සඳහා <1>{{data}}</1>  සම කාලසීමාව සකසන්න' or 'සියලුම ගොනු සඳහා <1>{{data}}</1>  හි ක්‍රියාත්මන කාලය සකසන්න'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'සියලුම ගොනු සඳහා <1>{{data}}</1>  සම කාලසීමාව සකසන්න' or 'සියලුම ගොනු සඳහා <1>{{data}}</1>  හි ක්‍රියාත්මන කාලය සකසන්න'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The `<1>` and `</1>` tags are not localized. They should be translated or removed if not relevant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Evaluate whether `<1>` and `</1>` need localization. If so, translate them appropriately or remove them if they are placeholders that will be handled programmatically.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'Doba používania' is a literal translation of 'lifetime' but might not be the most natural phrasing in Slovak in this context. A more natural translation might be 'trvanlivosť' or 'životnosť'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastaviť trvanlivosť <1>{{data}}</1> pre všetky súbory v miestnosti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Nastavitev življenjske dobe" is too literal and doesn't flow naturally. A more accurate and natural translation would be something like "Določitev življenjske dobe" or "Nastavitev veljavnosti".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Določitev življenjske dobe <1>{{data}}</1> za vse datoteke v sobi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The format tags `<1>` and `</1>` are identical in both the English and Slovenian, which is acceptable but might warrant review for consistency across all translations if those tags have a specific meaning/function.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, but review consistency of format tags across all translations.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'фајлове' is technically correct, but 'датутеке' (datoteke) is more commonly used for 'files' in a technical context in Serbian. 'фајлове' feels like a direct transliteration and less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Постави време трајања од <1>{{data}}</1> за све датутеке у соби

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Set lifetime" is better translated as "Podesi vreme trajanja" instead of "Postavi vreme trajanja". "Postavi" implies a more permanent setting, while "podesi" is more appropriate for a configurable lifetime.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Podesi vreme trajanja od <1>{{data}}</1> za sve fajlove u sobi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "lifetime" is best translated as "geçerlilik süresi" or "saklama süresi" in this context, rather than literally translating it as "yaşam süresi". "Yaşam süresi" typically refers to a living organism's lifespan.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odadaki bütün dosyalar için <1>{{data}}</1> geçerlilik süresi ayarlayın

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term "lifetime" is better translated as "термін існування" rather than just "період існування" for greater accuracy in a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Задати термін існування <1>{{data}}</1> для всіх файлів у кімнаті
